definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Yesterday, in the neighbouring villages, it was "open-farm" day.
sentences.chinese: 昨天在鄰村是農房開門的日節的。

sentences.english: The farmhouse is in an out-of-the-way valley.
sentences.chinese: 農房是在遠處的山谷裏。

sentences.english: They came to a farm house in front of which sat a small boy.
sentences.chinese: 他們來到一家農房，前面坐着一個小男孩。

sentences.english: Seen from a distance, the farmhouse looked deserted.
sentences.chinese: 從遠處看，這座農房看起來是孤零零的。
